item.title: Dummy help and 1 other little thing
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

[code]public void hitDummy()
{
if (FightType == 1) // attack

		addSkillXP(3, 0);
		addSkillXP(3, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 1);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	if (FightType == 2) // strength
	{
		addSkillXP(3, 0);
		addSkillXP(3, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 2);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 3) // defence
	{
		addSkillXP(3, 0);
		addSkillXP(3, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 3);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 4) // controlled
	{
		addSkillXP(1, 0);
		addSkillXP(1, 0);
		addSkillXP(1, 0);
		addSkillXP(3, 3);
                    addSkillXP(25, 4);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 5) // Accurate
	{
                    addSkillXP(3, 06);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
}[/code]

That’s for the dummys.
You’ve got to change the skill experience on the teleports to like ten million.

Read full topic

item.title: Dummy help and 1 other little thing
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

[code]public void hitDummy()
{
if (FightType == 1) // attack

		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 1);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	if (FightType == 2) // strength
	{
		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 2);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 3) // defence
	{
		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 3);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 4) // controlled
	{
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(25, 4);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 5) // Accurate
	{
                    addSkillXP(50, 06);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
}[/code]

Ok i have that for dummies and i was wondering if sum 1 could help me make it so that its …working like real rs or normal servers lol

and the other little thing is

How do i change mage xp lvl ITS SUPER FAST LVLING!!!
